interestingFacts: Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands and is known for its bullet trains and cherry blossoms.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest and the famous Christ the Redeemer statue in Rio de Janeiro.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world combined.
India is the world's largest democracy and the birthplace of yoga and chess.
Australia is the only continent covered by a single country and is home to the Great Barrier Reef.
Egypt is home to one of the world’s oldest civilizations and the iconic pyramids of Giza.
Germany is known for its engineering, Oktoberfest, and being a leader in the European Union.
South Korea is famous for K-pop, high-speed internet, and technological innovations.
